channel.title: Edit videos on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Edit videos on Security365 Docs

item.title: Add captions
item.description: Add captionsAdding captions and subtitles to your video library. ​​ Add or modify a caption To create or modify a caption on a video a Cloudflare API Token External link icon Open external link is required. The <LANGUAGE_TAG> must adhere to the BCP 47 format External link icon Open external link . For convenience, the most common language codes are provided at the bottom of this document. If the language you are adding isn’t included in the table, you can find the value through the The IANA registry External link icon Open external link , which maintains a list of language codes.

item.title: Apply watermarks
item.description: Apply watermarksYou can add watermarks to videos uploaded using the Stream API. To add watermarks to your videos, first create a watermark profile. A watermark profile describes the image you would like to be used as a watermark and the position of that image. Once you have a watermark profile, you can use it as an option when uploading videos. ​​ Quick start Watermark profile has many customizable options. However, the default parameters generally work for most cases.

item.title: Clip videos
item.description: Clip videosWith video clipping, also referred to as “trimming” or changing the length of the video, you can change the start and end points of a video so viewers only see a specific “clip” of the video. For example, if you have a 20 minute video but only want to share a five minute clip from the middle of the video, you can clip the video to remove the content before and after the five minute clip.
